courses: 3D Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Reinforcement Learning, Robotics

publications.name: Map-Aware Human Pose Prediction for Robot Follow-Ahead
publications.summary: We address the environmental-conditioned human pose prediction problem in the context of robot follow-ahead.

publications.name: Learning to Play Pursuit-Evasion with Visibility Constraints
publications.summary: We address the pursuit-evasion problem in mainly two aspects: an multi-agent reinforcement learning; a representation design for belief state (contaminated region) to improve Markovian property.

publications.name: A Novel Parallel and Self-adaptive Robot Hand with Triple-shaft Pulley-belt Mechanisms
publications.summary: We design a noval parallel pinching and self-adapting grasping hand, TPM hand.

Work.name: Plus.AI
Work.position: Reinfocement Learning for Autonomous Driving Internship
Work.summary: Offline reinforcement learning for autonomous driving. Deployed trained agent into the ROS system with ONNX and TensorRT.

Work.name: SportsVision

projects.name: View Planning for Dynamic Objects
projects.summary: Online view planning metric on dynamic object for high-fidelity 3D reconstruction

projects.name: Manpulation for Fruit-Picking
projects.summary: RL-based manipulation for object grasping and fruit-picking with tactile feedback.

volunteer.summary: Organized summer camps for three consecutive years to empower 100+ “left-behind” Chinese children whose parents are absent due to economic displacement, with a team of 40+ volunteers. Raised Funds.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine
